column5: status: Current Everyday Smoker -- 1.0 packs/day for 30 years  Smokeless tobacco: Not on file
She is 40+ pack year smoker, she has tried multiple times to quit.
History:  He  reports that he quit smoking about 8 years ago. He has quit using smokeless tobacco.
The patient used to smoke approximately one pack a day for the past 40 years
Quit smoking 3 years ago after smoking for 50 years.
